snippet: Explanations for the struggles of the Nets’ point guard include fatigue, a bum wrist and, according to him, a loss of confidence.
abstract: Howard Beck On Pro Basketball column says explanations for struggles of Brooklyn Nets’ point guard Derron Williams, include fatigue, bum wrist and, according to him, loss of confidence; says Nets need the Deron Williams they thought they had acquired to reinvigorate franchise and start new era.
lead_paragraph: Explanations for the struggles of the Nets’ point guard include fatigue, a bum wrist and, according to him, a loss of confidence.

headline.seo: The Existential Crisis of Deron Williams
headline.main: The Existential Crisis of Deron Williams
headline.print_headline: The Existential Crisis of Deron Williams
